verbs.description: septa train derails on market - frankford line near spring garden a septa train on the market - frankford line [V: was] slowly headed eastbound approaching the spring garden station when an equipment problem reportedly occurred causing one car to partially jump off the spring garden andrew busch spring garden station train septa philadelphia
